      • getEmbeddedDTMC

        public ProbModel getEmbeddedDTMC(PrismLog log,
                                 boolean convertRewards)
                          throws PrismException
        Get the embedded DTMC for this CTMC.
        If parameter log is non-null, print some statistics.
        If parameter convertRewards is true, transforms the rewards as well, otherwise the reward structures are stripped.
        [ REFS: result, DEREFS: nothing ]
        Parameters:
        log - the log for printing statistics (may be null)
        convertRewards - if true, rewards are transformed, otherwise they are stripped
        Returns:
        the embedded DTMC
        Throws:
        PrismException
